guide.conclusion: This was a fun project. It has withstood a few powerful storms. In time the PVC will degrade but for an inexpensive project it was enjoyable to do.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I've put together a YouTube video of this project. The parts were purchased at a local hardware store. The total cost was around $50.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I've put together a YouTube video of this project. The parts were purchased at a local hardware store. The total cost was around $50.

Relevant parts
  • The video outlines the required parts.
Tools
  • Drill
  • Hand saw
  • Pliers
  • screw driver

parts.text: The video outlines the required parts.

guide.summary: Build a 20' tall PVC tower mast for a ham radio antenna very cheaply and easily.
guide.title: PVC Ham Radio Tower Project
